full_text: @id_dad Feel free to send me an email with any thoughts or suggestions and I'll certainly raise them with the Minister and consider them as the bills are being examined.

@id_dad Hi Dave, the LDA and the Affordable Housing bills are currently going through the Oireachtas. If you would like to be kept informed about the details please send me an email to cormac@cormacdevlin.ie and I will send on details when they are finalised

597 public housing units will be constructed on the old Shanganagh Prison site in Shankill. 200 social, 91 affordable purchase & 306 cost rental units will be built.   This is a great example of the new Land Development Agency working with local councils to deliver public housing https://t.co/0BwnkL4q1z

@MariaMernagh Hi Maria, one-beds in the Shankill area are being let for ‚Ç¨1,500 with two-beds going for ‚Ç¨2,000, the estimated cost-rental would be a considerable reduction (‚Ç¨500-‚Ç¨1,000 a month) which would give people a chance to save. Not a solution for everyone wanting to buy but welcome
